name: Myu Story -prologue
description:
"The Game Just Prototype create using Godot Game Engine"

This game is only available in Indonesian.

This game was made to fulfill one of the course assignments in 2020. I developed this game myself by taking game mechanics inspired from the game "Layton's Mystery Journey: Katrielle and The Millionaires' Conspiracy" and "√Letter - Root Letter -:.

"New Myu Story - Prologue" is basically a visual novel game that tells the story of Myu a girl who wakes up in a strange place due to a contract with a cat at her school.

The assets used were partially created by myself by combining the existing assets below

As for other assets:

  1. Some vector images using assets from Freepik.
  2. Some icon used comes from Iconfinder.
  3. Some assests & music used comes from OpenGameArt.
  4. Some music used comes from Taira Komori.
  5. Some assests & music used comes from itch.io.

If there are sources of assets not included, you can be submitted via the comments so that I can add them in the future.

- Thanks...
